nodes.text: Capture of the Mon Calamari ship

The Capture of the Mon Calamari ship was a battle that took place during the Clone Wars. A Mon Calamari ship carrying Jedi Master Quarmall and a group of Jedi younglings was ambushed by a Separatist fleet. The ship was boarded by Grievous and contingent of battle droids, who overpowered the Mon Calamari crew and Jedi Master Quarmall. Quarmall was left for dead by Grievous, but eventually managed to survive due to his Abyssin physiology. The Padawans were captured and imprisoned by Grievous.
